嚂字的基本解释

嚂
làn
贪求。

嚂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hǎn］
［《廣韻》呼覽切，上敢，曉。］
［《廣韻》苦濫切，去闞，溪。］
大声述说。
[②]［làn］
［《廣韻》盧瞰切，去闞，來。］
贪；饮食不节。
[③]［xiān］
见“嚂3嘘”。

嚂字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚂； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页211第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?盧瞰切，音濫。【玉篇】貪也。【廣韻】食貌。【淮南子·齊俗訓】芻豢黍梁，荆吳芬馨，以嚂其口。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?苦濫切，音闞。【廣韻】呵也。【集韻】與喊同。　又【廣韻】呼覽切【集韻】【韻會】虎覽切，?音㯺。聲也。亦與喊同。【戰國策】橫人嚂口利機。【註】嚂，聲也，言聲說所利之事。　又【集韻】盧甘切，音藍。與懢同。貪貌。

嚂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嚂字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
嚂
làn
Greed.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hǎn］
["Guangyun" call out and cut, go up and dare, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" cuts bitterly, go to Kan, Xi. ]
Tell it aloud.
[②]［làn］
["Guangyun" Lu Kanqi, go to Kan, come. ]
Greedy; poor diet.
[③] [xiān]
See "Hoo 3 Hush".

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嚂; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 211-25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Lu Kanqie, the sound is too much. [Jade articles] Greedy too. [Guang Yun] Food appearance. [Huainanzi·Qi Suxun] A rudimentary of Xiaoyingliang, Jingwu Fenxin, to exaggerate its mouth.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hard cut, sound Kan. [Guang Yun] Oh also. 【Jiyun】Same as shouting.　 [Guang Yun] Hu Lan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tiger Lan Qi,? Yin 㯺. Sound also. Also the same as shouting. [Warring States Policy] Hengren yelling at a good opportunity. [Note] Nao, sound also, talk about what it benefits.　[Jiyun] Luganqie, sound blue. Same as 懢. Greedy.
